page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: The village of{Burtonwood}and the surrounding area have several different styles of housing. Many of the old{farm houses}are now privately owned and the farm land has been taken over by{Warrington New Town {Development,}the projected use of this land being for{housing}and{employment. Within the village itself are a few renovated{cottages}but apart from that the housing can be split into two main catagories. There is a large{council {house estate}of mainly traditional{ {semi-detached houses}with gardens to the front and back. There are a few streets of{privately {owned terraced houses}although the bulk of the private housing is a new estate of{houses}and{bungalows} incorporating{detached}and{semi- {detached}residences.
